name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame
description: Live the adrenaline and the excitement of the 2017 Monster Energy Supercross Championship with MONSTER ENERGY SUPERCROSS - THE OFFICIAL VIDEOGAME!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K;  AMD FX-6350  or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon HD 7800 with 2 GB VRAM or more DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K,  AMD FX-8350 Eight-Core or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
